channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
Hey im just trying to find a workin compiler. i have the latest version of java i just need the code for one if anyone could supply me with that.
Sorry, i know its kind of a basic thing but im a noob o.o

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Ok go to this Java download page and get Java 6u2
http://java.sun.com/products/archive/j2se/6u2/index.html

Now, go to start right click computer and go to properties
Go to advanced click
Enviroment Variables

Under user Variables click New and name the Variable
CLASSPATH
Inside Value box right this
CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Now Click New again (Still under User Variables)
And name it
PATH
Inside the box write
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @nozirev nozirev
item.description:
@nozirev wrote:

Okay uhm first right click your Compiler then click edit erase everything and put this code in:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit:

Read full topic
